messages.content:
i want build a website hosted in s3 and cloudfront enabled. I'd like to using an ec2 (c5.xlarge) with 100 gb of EBS storage for my backend in a vpc within a subnet. The server should be able to access internet so make sure the security group has those enable as required. 
the ec2 should be able to access data in s3 bucket called 'datainfo'. 
I also neeed a RDS datbase (can be a small instance) The ec2 server should should be able to query this RDS datbase. Make sure the RDS is also in the same VPC.

I need more information: Which AWS region would you like to use?
Is this for development, staging, or production?
